snippet.title: Nothing Beyond This Point: Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3321280/Nothing_Beyond_This_Point/

Infinite health, but your health is your damage. Dynamic combat, powerful items and abilities, and rods to keep you alive. All in a sprawling, dark void. You're all alone down here... get stronger, get better, and get out.

Nothing Beyond This Point is a top-down action Metroidvania with a unique health/damage system and many secrets to uncover. You're made out of fire - will that give you an advantage over the rest? Or will you be just as corrupted as them?
May Raimor be on your side.
